Major_Arcs.title: Circus Arrival and Initial Excitement
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the circus coming to town, the initial excitement and Paul Bunyan's performance, and the public's reaction to the exotic animals.

sub_scenes.title: Paul Bunyan's Performance
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of Paul Bunyan and his circus act.

sub_scenes.title: Townspeople's Excitement
sub_scenes.description: News of the circus spreads and excites the townspeople.

sub_scenes.title: Observing Circus Animals
sub_scenes.description: People at the circus grounds observe a giraffe.

Major_Arcs.title: Mystery and Conflict in the Circus Tent
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to a tense situation inside a circus tent, involving sounds of trouble, confrontation, and violence.

sub_scenes.title: Investigation of Sounds
sub_scenes.description: Two men outside a tent hear sounds of trouble and decide to investigate.

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Fight with Grasso
sub_scenes.description: Inside a tent, a confrontation escalates into a fight involving 'Billings/Grasso'.

Major_Arcs.title: Paul Bunyan's Recruitment
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the interaction between Paul Bunyan and the circus owner, leading to Paul Bunyan becoming the new strongman.

sub_scenes.title: Strongman's Display and Owner's Plea
sub_scenes.description: A strongman throws a man in a suit, leading to a conversation.

sub_scenes.title: Owner's Grasso Backstory
sub_scenes.description: The circus owner explains his history with Matto Grasso.

sub_scenes.title: Recruitment of Paul Bunyan
sub_scenes.description: The circus owner recruits the strongman to become Paul Bunyan.

Major_Arcs.title: Grasso's Revenge and Paul Bunyan's Heroism
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts Matto Grasso's vengeful plot against Paul Bunyan and Paul Bunyan's heroic actions to save the circus.

sub_scenes.title: Paul Bunyan's Acclaim and Grasso's Envy
sub_scenes.description: Paul Bunyan is celebrated while Matto Grasso plots revenge.

narrative_arcs.title: Paul Bunyan's Acclaim and Grasso's Envy

sub_scenes.title: Grasso's Sabotage Plan
sub_scenes.description: Matto Grasso prepares to set the circus tent on fire.

sub_scenes.title: Bunyan Stops the Fire
sub_scenes.description: Paul Bunyan heroically puts out the fire in the circus tent.

Major_Arcs.title: Grasso's Second Plot and the Chase
Major_Arcs.description: Grasso devises a new plan involving Gigantico, leading to a chase involving Paul Bunyan.

sub_scenes.title: Grasso's New Plan
sub_scenes.description: Matto Grasso plots to release Gigantico.

sub_scenes.title: Gigantico's Escape and Bunyan's Intervention
sub_scenes.description: Gigantico is released, and Paul Bunyan intervenes.

sub_scenes.title: The Chase Begins
sub_scenes.description: Grasso flees, and Paul Bunyan starts the chase.

Major_Arcs.title: The Chase and Capture of Grasso
Major_Arcs.description: The chase between Paul Bunyan and Grasso continues inside the circus arena, culminating in Grasso's capture.

sub_scenes.title: Arena and Intervention Plan
sub_scenes.description: Grasso enters the arena, and someone plans to intervene.

narrative_arcs.title: Entering the Arena and New Plan

sub_scenes.title: Weight Throw Attempt
sub_scenes.description: Grasso tries to use a weight as a weapon but fails.

sub_scenes.title: Bucket Trick and Continued Escape
sub_scenes.description: Grasso attempts another trick with a bucket and continues to escape.

narrative_arcs.title: Bucket as a Trick and Continued Escape

sub_scenes.title: Capture and Threat
sub_scenes.description: Paul Bunyan captures Grasso and threatens to throw him onto a trapeze.

narrative_arcs.title: The Turn to Fight and Capture

Major_Arcs.title: Resolution and Bunyan's Departure
Major_Arcs.description: The Grasso conflict is resolved, and Paul Bunyan decides to leave the circus, returning to his preferred quiet life.

sub_scenes.title: Trapeze Toss and Audience Reaction
sub_scenes.description: Paul Bunyan throws Grasso onto a trapeze bar, to the audience's surprise.

narrative_arcs.title: The Trapeze Toss and Audience Reaction

sub_scenes.title: Formal Capture and Job Offer
sub_scenes.description: Authorities praise Paul Bunyan and offer him a job.

sub_scenes.title: Bunyan's Farewell
sub_scenes.description: Paul Bunyan declines the job and leaves the circus.

Major_Arcs.title: Marco Polo and the Talking Head
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Marco Polo and a mysterious encounter with a severed, talking head in Tibet.

sub_scenes.title: Marco Polo's Encounter
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of Marco Polo and his encounter with the 'Awful Ogress of Tibet'.

narrative_arcs.title: Marco Polo's Encounter with the Ogress

sub_scenes.title: Discovery of Severed Head
sub_scenes.description: A man on horseback discovers a severed head.

sub_scenes.title: Talking Head's Plea
sub_scenes.description: The severed head comes to life and pleads for help.

Major_Arcs.title: The Magic Dagger and Mourning City
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc involves a magic dagger and a city in mourning, encountered by a man on horseback.

sub_scenes.title: Sacred Dagger and Debt
sub_scenes.description: A man on horseback is gifted a magic dagger.

narrative_arcs.title: The Sacred Dagger and Debt Repayment

sub_scenes.title: Knife Inaction and Departure
sub_scenes.description: Explanation about the dagger and farewell.

narrative_arcs.title: The Question of the Knife's Inaction and Farewell

sub_scenes.title: Arrival at Mourning City
sub_scenes.description: The man arrives at a city in mourning.

Major_Arcs.title: Princess Lotus and the Witch's Castle
Major_Arcs.description: Marco Polo arrives in a city in mourning and gets involved in the mystery of Princess Lotus's disappearance, leading him to a witch's castle.

sub_scenes.title: Royal Welcome
sub_scenes.description: Marco Polo arrives in Hi-toun and is welcomed by the King.

narrative_arcs.title: Marco Polo's Arrival and Royal Welcome

sub_scenes.title: King's Grief
sub_scenes.description: The King explains the disappearance of Princess Lotus.

narrative_arcs.title: The King's Grief and Princess Lotus's Disappearance

sub_scenes.title: Marco Polo Offers Help
sub_scenes.description: Marco Polo offers to help find Princess Lotus.

sub_scenes.title: A Plea from a Starving Woman
sub_scenes.description: A woman pleads for help for her starving children.

narrative_arcs.title: A Plea from a Starving Woman

sub_scenes.title: Journey to Witch's Castle
sub_scenes.description: Marco Polo agrees to help and rides with the woman to her house, perceived as a witch's castle.

Major_Arcs.title: Confrontation with the Ogress
Major_Arcs.description: Marco Polo enters the witch's castle, only to discover the woman is an ogress, leading to a dangerous confrontation.

sub_scenes.title: Mysterious Castle and Strange Children
sub_scenes.description: Inside the castle, the woman reveals strange 'children' – mice.

narrative_arcs.title: Entering the Mysterious Castle and Strange Children

sub_scenes.title: Ogress Transformation
sub_scenes.description: The woman transforms into an ogress, revealing her true form.

sub_scenes.title: Sword Drawn and Attack
sub_scenes.description: Marco Polo draws his sword to defend against the ogress and her monstrous mice.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation with Monstrous Mice and Sword Drawn

Major_Arcs.title: Defeat of the Ogress
Major_Arcs.description: Marco Polo faces capture by the Ogress but uses the magic knife to escape and defeat her.

sub_scenes.title: Initial Attack and Escape Attempt
sub_scenes.description: A cloaked figure (ogress in disguise) attacks a man.

sub_scenes.title: Snake Entrapment
sub_scenes.description: The man is captured by magical snakes.

sub_scenes.title: Further Restraint and Mockery
sub_scenes.description: The cloaked figure mocks the captured man.

sub_scenes.title: Captivity and Ogre's Threat
sub_scenes.description: The ogress reveals her plan to eat the captives.

sub_scenes.title: Magic Knife and Hope
sub_scenes.description: The man remembers the magic knife and sees a chance for escape.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of the Special Knife and Hope

sub_scenes.title: Ogress's Downfall
sub_scenes.description: The man uses the magic knife to defeat the ogress.

Major_Arcs.title: Reunion and Magic Knife Gift
Major_Arcs.description: Marco Polo rescues Princess Lotus, returns her to her father, and gifts the magic knife before continuing his adventures.

sub_scenes.title: Escape from Dungeon
sub_scenes.description: Using the magic knife, they escape the dungeon.

narrative_arcs.title: Escape from the Dungeon with the Magic Knife

sub_scenes.title: Misunderstanding of Black Drapes
sub_scenes.description: Arrival at the city and cultural misunderstanding about black drapes.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival and the Misunderstanding of Black Drapes

sub_scenes.title: Reunion and Gift
sub_scenes.description: Reunion with the father, job offer, and gift of the magic knife.

Major_Arcs.title: The Treasure of Davy Jones - Prologue and Betrayal
Major_Arcs.description: A story about treasure, betrayal, and revenge begins with a prologue and shifts to a British penal colony.

sub_scenes.title: Treasure Keeper's Prologue
sub_scenes.description: A prologue sets up a tale of treasure.

sub_scenes.title: Life in Penal Colony
sub_scenes.description: Setting in a British penal colony.

sub_scenes.title: Prisoner's Bargain
sub_scenes.description: A prisoner offers a treasure map to Captain Brooking for escape.

sub_scenes.title: News of Betrayal
sub_scenes.description: Jordan learns of Captain Brooking's betrayal.

sub_scenes.title: Inquiry and Imprisonment
sub_scenes.description: Jordan's outburst leads to solitary confinement.

sub_scenes.title: Years of Imprisonment and Release
sub_scenes.description: Jordan serves his time and is released.

sub_scenes.title: Vow of Revenge
sub_scenes.description: Jordan vows revenge against Captain Brooking.

Major_Arcs.title: Jordan's Revenge and Moral Lesson
Major_Arcs.description: Jordan seeks out Captain Brooking for revenge, leading to a confrontation and a moral conclusion about treasure.

sub_scenes.title: Jordan's Vigil
sub_scenes.description: Jordan waits for Captain Brooking.

sub_scenes.title: Theatre Plans
sub_scenes.description: Captain Brooking makes plans unaware of Jordan.

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation at Brooking's Home
sub_scenes.description: Jordan confronts Brooking and is invited to his home.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation and Resolution at Brooking's Home

sub_scenes.title: Journey to Attic and Treasure
sub_scenes.description: Brooking leads Jordan to the attic to show the treasure.

narrative_arcs.title: Journey to the Attic and Treasure Reveal

sub_scenes.title: Betrayal and Fight
sub_scenes.description: Jordan reveals his plan to kill Brooking, and a fight ensues.

sub_scenes.title: Fight Resolution and Death
sub_scenes.description: Jordan kills Captain Brooking.

sub_scenes.title: Police Investigation
sub_scenes.description: Police hear a gunshot and investigate.

narrative_arcs.title: Police Investigate Shot and Discover Body

sub_scenes.title: Escape Attempt and Homicide Squad
sub_scenes.description: Jordan tries to escape as police surround the house.

sub_scenes.title: Moral Conclusion
sub_scenes.description: A moral conclusion about the corrupting nature of treasure is presented.

Major_Arcs.title: Dr. Styx and the Haunted Estate - Introduction
Major_Arcs.description: A new narrative thread introduces Dr. Styx and a haunted estate, setting up a supernatural mystery.

sub_scenes.title: Dr. Styx's Ominous Encounter
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of Dr. Styx in an ominous scene.

sub_scenes.title: Vincent Matthews's Sentencing
sub_scenes.description: Vincent Matthews is sentenced to death for murder.

sub_scenes.title: White Elephant Estate
sub_scenes.description: Dr. Styx and Henry Northrup discuss the unsellable Matthews Estate.

sub_scenes.title: Supernatural Expertise
sub_scenes.description: Dr. Styx reveals his expertise in supernatural matters.

sub_scenes.title: Arrival at Haunted Estate
sub_scenes.description: Mr. Northrup arrives at the haunted Matthews Estate.

sub_scenes.title: Warning and Defiance
sub_scenes.description: Mr. Northrup is warned but enters the house anyway.

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation with Vincent Matthews
sub_scenes.description: Mr. Northrup encounters the ghost of Vincent Matthews.

sub_scenes.title: Northrup's Hatred
sub_scenes.description: Mr. Northrup reveals his hatred and threatens Vincent Matthews.

sub_scenes.title: Imminent Destruction
sub_scenes.description: Vincent Matthews threatens to destroy Mr. Northrup.

Major_Arcs.title: Fight with Vincent Matthews and Moral Choice
Major_Arcs.description: Mr. Northrup and Vincent Matthews engage in a fight, leading to a moral and spiritual resolution.

sub_scenes.title: Initial Attack and Power Claim
sub_scenes.description: Vincent Matthews attacks Mr. Northrup.

narrative_arcs.title: Initial Attack and Claim of Power

sub_scenes.title: Northrup's Backstep
sub_scenes.description: Mr. Northrup stumbles, creating an opening.

sub_scenes.title: Matthews' Grip and Struggle
sub_scenes.description: Vincent Matthews grabs Mr. Northrup by the throat.

sub_scenes.title: Northrup's Strength and Surprise
sub_scenes.description: Mr. Northrup breaks free with surprising strength.

sub_scenes.title: Questioning Violence and Power Shift
sub_scenes.description: A cloaked man questions the seated man about violence.

narrative_arcs.title: Questioning Violence and Shifting Power Dynamics

sub_scenes.title: Confession of Fear
sub_scenes.description: The seated man confesses his lifelong fear.

narrative_arcs.title: Confession of Fear and Societal Position

sub_scenes.title: Forgiveness and Love Solution
sub_scenes.description: The cloaked man proposes forgiveness and love as salvation.

narrative_arcs.title: The Solution of Forgiveness and Love

sub_scenes.title: Revelation of Rosalind and Murder
sub_scenes.description: The cloaked man reveals the murdered sister, Rosalind.

narrative_arcs.title: The Revelation of Rosalind and the Murder

Major_Arcs.title: Resolution with Rosalind
Major_Arcs.description: The narrative arc resolves with the summoning of Rosalind and a spiritual resolution through forgiveness and brotherly love.

sub_scenes.title: Forced Confrontation and Domination
sub_scenes.description: The cloaked man forces the man in white to face someone.

sub_scenes.title: Summoning of Rosalind
sub_scenes.description: Rosalind Matthews is summoned.

sub_scenes.title: Accusation and Forgiveness
sub_scenes.description: Rosalind forgives the man in white.

sub_scenes.title: Demand for Brotherly Love and Release
sub_scenes.description: Brotherly love is demanded for release.

narrative_arcs.title: Demand for Brotherly Love and Release

sub_scenes.title: Resolution and Departure of Spirits
sub_scenes.description: Spirits are resolved and depart.

sub_scenes.title: Return to Living World
sub_scenes.description: Return to the mundane world and reassurance.

Major_Arcs.title: Henry Hudson's First Voyage - Search for Northwest Passage
Major_Arcs.description: The narrative shifts to the historical figure of Henry Hudson and his voyages to find the Northwest Passage.

sub_scenes.title: Enigma of Hudson's Fate
sub_scenes.description: Introduction to Henry Hudson's mysterious fate.

narrative_arcs.title: The Enigma of Henry Hudson's Fate

sub_scenes.title: Dutch East India Company Proposition
sub_scenes.description: Hudson is offered a voyage by the Dutch East India Company.

narrative_arcs.title: The Dutch East India Company's Proposition

sub_scenes.title: Hudson's Acceptance
sub_scenes.description: Hudson accepts the proposition.

sub_scenes.title: Rising Tensions and Turn South
sub_scenes.description: Tensions rise on the voyage, and they turn south.

narrative_arcs.title: Rising Tensions and a Turn Southward

sub_scenes.title: Entering Hudson River
sub_scenes.description: They enter the Hudson River with hope.

narrative_arcs.title: Entering the Hudson River with Hope

sub_scenes.title: Disappointment in Hudson River
sub_scenes.description: Disappointment as the Hudson River is not the passage.

sub_scenes.title: Hudson's Resignation and Return Decision
sub_scenes.description: Hudson decides to return to Holland.

narrative_arcs.title: Hudson's Resignation and Decision to Return

sub_scenes.title: Return to Holland
sub_scenes.description: The ship returns to Holland.

Major_Arcs.title: Henry Hudson's Second Voyage and Mutiny
Major_Arcs.description: Hudson's second voyage faces more hardship, leading to mutiny and his disappearance.

sub_scenes.title: New Voyage and Company
sub_scenes.description: Hudson gets backing for another voyage.

narrative_arcs.title: Another Voyage Backed by a New Company

sub_scenes.title: Trapped in Ice
sub_scenes.description: The ship gets trapped in ice.

narrative_arcs.title: Trapped in Ice and Winter Quarters

sub_scenes.title: Ice Melts and Disagreement
sub_scenes.description: Ice melts, but disagreement arises about continuing.

narrative_arcs.title: The Ice Melts and Disagreement Over Course

sub_scenes.title: Mutiny Begins
sub_scenes.description: The crew mutinies against Captain Hudson.

sub_scenes.title: Ousting of Hudson
sub_scenes.description: Hudson is ousted from the ship after a scuffle.

narrative_arcs.title: Scuffle and Ousting of Captain Hudson

sub_scenes.title: Hudson Set Adrift
sub_scenes.description: Hudson is set adrift in a small boat.

narrative_arcs.title: Captain Hudson Set Adrift and Mutineers' Departure

sub_scenes.title: Mutineers' Return and Arrest
sub_scenes.description: Mutineers return home and are arrested.

Major_Arcs.title: Hassan and the Tartar Rescue Mission - Mission Briefing and Infiltration
Major_Arcs.description: A new story arc begins with Hassan, the Arabian Knight, tasked with rescuing a kidnapped woman from Tartars.

sub_scenes.title: Tartar Chase
sub_scenes.description: Hassan is chased by Tartar horsemen.

sub_scenes.title: Caliph's Mission
sub_scenes.description: Hassan is summoned by the Caliph for a rescue mission.

narrative_arcs.title: Summoned by the Caliph for a Rescue Mission

sub_scenes.title: Setting off to Confront Tartars
sub_scenes.description: Hassan sets off to confront the Tartars.

narrative_arcs.title: Setting off to Confront the Tartars

sub_scenes.title: Oasis Discovery
sub_scenes.description: Hassan discovers Tartar tracks at an oasis.

sub_scenes.title: Warning from Traveler
sub_scenes.description: Hassan is warned by a traveler about the Tartars.

sub_scenes.title: Farewell and Continued Mission
sub_scenes.description: Hassan continues his mission despite warnings.

sub_scenes.title: Reaching Tartar Camp Outskirts
sub_scenes.description: Hassan reaches the Tartar camp.

sub_scenes.title: Sentry Threat and Attack
sub_scenes.description: Hassan ambushes a Tartar sentry.

sub_scenes.title: Disguise and Infiltration Plan
sub_scenes.description: Hassan plans to infiltrate the camp in disguise.

sub_scenes.title: Inside Tartar Camp and Confirmation
sub_scenes.description: Hassan infiltrates the camp and confirms the daughter's presence.

narrative_arcs.title: Inside the Tartar Camp and Confirmation of the Daughter

Major_Arcs.title: Hassan's Capture and Challenge by Kurgan
Major_Arcs.description: Hassan makes contact with the prisoner but is detected and captured, leading to a challenge by Kurgan.

sub_scenes.title: Contacting Prisoner
sub_scenes.description: Hassan contacts the prisoner, revealing her to be his aide.

sub_scenes.title: Detection and Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Hassan is detected by Tartar soldiers.

narrative_arcs.title: Detection and Confrontation by Tartar Soldiers

sub_scenes.title: Capture and Order to Kurgan
sub_scenes.description: Hassan is captured and ordered to be taken to Kurgan.

sub_scenes.title: Kurgan's Interrogation and Challenge
sub_scenes.description: Kurgan interrogates Hassan and proposes a challenge.

sub_scenes.title: Negotiation for Combat
sub_scenes.description: Hassan and Kurgan negotiate terms for the combat.

sub_scenes.title: Hassan's Resolve
sub_scenes.description: Hassan resolves to win the challenge.

Major_Arcs.title: Hassan's Contest and Romantic Conclusion
Major_Arcs.description: Hassan fights Kurgan's men, wins, and has a romantic conclusion with the rescued woman.

sub_scenes.title: Start of Contest
sub_scenes.description: The contest begins on the north field.

narrative_arcs.title: The Signal and the Start of the Contest

sub_scenes.title: Dirt as Weapon and Initial Attack
sub_scenes.description: Hassan uses dirt as a weapon.

narrative_arcs.title: Dirt as a Weapon and Initial Attack

sub_scenes.title: Exploiting Advantage and Close Combat
sub_scenes.description: Hassan exploits his advantage and fights in close combat.

narrative_arcs.title: Exploiting the Advantage and Close Combat

sub_scenes.title: Sword Fight and Threat
sub_scenes.description: Continued combat and threats during the fight.

sub_scenes.title: Throwing and No Mercy
sub_scenes.description: Hassan shows no mercy and defeats an opponent.

sub_scenes.title: Aftermath and Negotiation with Kurgan
sub_scenes.description: After the fight, Hassan negotiates with Kurgan for the reward.

sub_scenes.title: Farewell and Clarification
sub_scenes.description: Farewell between Kurgan and the woman, and clarification from the woman.

sub_scenes.title: Questioning and Blushing
sub_scenes.description: Emotional interaction between Hassan and the woman.

sub_scenes.title: Bagdad, Departure, and Kiss
sub_scenes.description: Romantic conclusion with a kiss near Bagdad.
